channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 31 天不喝酒对您的健身目标到底有什么好处？我们请专家来解释一个月禁酒的好处。
item.description: What does no alcohol for 31 days actually do for your fitness goals? We asked experts to explain the benefits of a month of abstinence. on.wsj.com/3SNezIO on.wsj.com/3SNezIO

item.title: 如果您在西班牙和葡萄牙旅行时只去马德里、巴塞罗那和里斯本，那您就错过了。以下是一些可提供真实和有益体验的替代站点。
item.description: If you only visit Madrid, Barcelona and Lisbon when you travel to Spain and Portugal, you are missing out. Here are some alternative stops that offer real and rewarding experiences. on.wsj.com/48bNSls on.wsj.com/48bNSls

item.title: 在了解了最新的旅游趋势、著名的旅游景点和令人流连忘返的行程之后，我们为您的下一个假期提供了一些建议
item.description: After looking at the latest travel trends, notable openings and immersive itineraries, we've got a few ideas on where you could spend your next vacation on.wsj.com/3w6bpHs

item.title: 价值 10 亿美元的艺术收藏品本应平均分配给一个家庭的三个子女。后来，遗嘱被更改了。八年过去了，至少 18 起诉讼，传奇仍在继续。
item.description: A $1 billion art collection was to be divided equally among one family's three children. Then a will was changed. Eight years and at least 18 lawsuits later, the saga continues. on.wsj.com/42wfq3P on.wsj.com/42wfq3P

item.title: 对于身居高位的职场精英妈妈们来说，魔幻蘑菇已经成了她们在繁忙的社交和工作日程表上，无暇顾及宿醉的最佳选择。
item.description: For elite working moms in high-powered jobs, magic mushrooms have become the answer to a packed social and professional calendar with no time for hangovers on.wsj.com/3OAhCl6 on.wsj.com/3OAhCl6

item.title: 到中国出差的美国首席执行官们发现，这趟旅行需要真正的脚力：他们经常要在公司活动的舞台上唱歌或跳舞。"看老板跳舞很有趣"。
item.description: American CEOs traveling to China find the trip involves real footwork: They are often expected to sing or boogie on stage at company events. “It’s fun to watch your boss dance.” on.wsj.com/4991pf2

item.title: 随着最新边境协议的破裂，其背后的谈判人员不得不感叹他们几个月来的认真努力一无所获，@mollyesque 写道
item.description: As the latest border deal fell apart, the negotiators behind it were left to lament that their months of earnest effort had amounted to nothing, @mollyesque writes on.wsj.com/3whUPnN

item.title: 巴基斯坦将于周四举行选举投票，这将是对其脆弱的民主制度的一次考验，因为该国主要反对党的瘫痪和恐怖袭击的威胁将使投票日成为紧张的一天。
item.description: Pakistan is voting on Thursday in an election that will test its fragile democracy, as the hobbling of the country’s key opposition party and the threat of terrorist attacks make for a tense day at the polls on.wsj.com/3SQKKXR on.wsj.com/3SQKKXR

item.title: 观察：2021 年，23andMe 的估值为 60 亿美元，而现在它的股价还不到 1 美元。这就是这家曾经炙手可热的 DNA 检测公司难以盈利的原因。
item.description: Watch: 23andMe was valued at $6 billion in 2021, now its stock price is worth less than a dollar. Here’s why the once-hot DNA-testing company is struggling to profit. on.wsj.com/4byft3t on.wsj.com/4byft3t

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特的父亲斯科特曾在夏威夷大学打过橄榄球，后来从事金融工作。他当年的队友们现在才知道他和谁是亲戚。
item.description: Taylor Swift’s father, Scott, played football at the University of Hawaii before starting work in finance. His teammates from those days are only now discovering who he is related to. on.wsj.com/3SM95y1 on.wsj.com/3SM95y1

item.title: 位于曼哈顿第五大道的豪华公寓和酒店 Aman New York 的一整层公寓以 6158 万美元的价格成交。
item.description: A full-floor apartment at Aman New York, a luxury condominium and hotel on Fifth Avenue in Manhattan, has closed for $61.58 million on.wsj.com/3waKH0l on.wsj.com/3waKH0l

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@jasonrileywsj 写道：对资助校园新建图书馆的人的孙女给予特殊照顾可能是精英主义和不公平的，但并不违宪。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Granting special consideration to the granddaughter of someone who financed a new library on campus may be elitist and unfair, but it isn’t unconstitutional, writes @jasonrileywsj on.wsj.com/497uYxF

item.title: 除了叽叽喳喳的 "早起族"，每个人都讨厌早晨起床。下面教你如何装饰卧室，让你不再舍不得离开舒适的床铺。
item.description: Everyone except chirpy “morning people” hates getting up in the morning. Here's how to decorate a bedroom so that you'll be less reluctant to leave your cozy bed. on.wsj.com/4bx9A6G on.wsj.com/4bx9A6G

item.title: 迈克尔-B-乔丹在《信条》（Creed）中扮演英雄，在漫威电影《黑豹》（Black Panther）中扮演反派。在现实生活中，他自称是一个工作狂，喜欢冥想，闲暇时会尝试制作完美的意大利面酱。
item.description: Michael B. Jordan played the hero in “Creed” and the villain in Marvel’s “Black Panther” films. In real life, he’s a self-described workaholic who meditates and spends his free time trying to make the perfect pasta sauce. on.wsj.com/3waU0gL on.wsj.com/3waU0gL

item.title: 这家以超级碗体育场为名的小型廉价航空公司正悄然赢得越来越多的粉丝。乘客们说，他们喜欢这家航空公司的直飞航班，但也不得不接受其局限性。
item.description: The small budget airline with its name on the stadium hosting the Super Bowl is quietly gaining fans. Passengers say they love its nonstop flights, but they have to accept its limitations. on.wsj.com/3w5oKiZ

item.title: 拉斯维加斯转变为全球体育中心，反映了沙特阿拉伯为提升其全球形象而掀起的体育狂潮
item.description: The transformation of Las Vegas into a global sports hub mirrors the sports-fueled binge that Saudi Arabia has used to enhance its global profile on.wsj.com/48hp8so on.wsj.com/48hp8so

item.title: 现在办公室里到处都是细菌。祝你请病假好运。
item.description: The office is a mess of germs right now. Good luck taking a sick day. on.wsj.com/488pq4w

item.title: 多年来，你和你的朋友拥有同样多的钱。现在，你们之间的差距太大了。这会对你们的友谊造成什么影响？
item.description: For years, you and your friend had about the same amount of money. Now, there’s a huge gap. What will it do to your friendship? on.wsj.com/3SQT7CY on.wsj.com/3SQT7CY

item.title: 佛罗里达州一座拥有三栋房屋和一个私人游艇港湾的大院是美国最昂贵的挂牌房产，如果它的售价接近要价，将创下美国最昂贵的房屋销售记录。探索这座巨大的海滨庄园。
item.description: A Florida compound with three houses and a private yacht basin is the priciest listing in the U.S., and would set a record for the most expensive home sale in the country if it fetches close to its asking price. Explore the massive, waterfront estate. on.wsj.com/42thhqj

item.title: 自 90 年代以来，越来越多的美国人在家中增设了小教堂，作为专用房间或独立建筑，其中一些小教堂的建造费用高达数十万美元。
item.description: Since the ’90s, more Americans have added chapels to their homes as dedicated rooms or separate buildings—some of which that cost hundreds of thousands to build on.wsj.com/494Utjb on.wsj.com/494Utjb

item.title: 税务问题：一位读者问：他和妻子是否应该在其中一人去世之前暂缓出售房屋？
item.description: Tax question: A reader asks if he and his wife should hold off selling their home until one of them dies on.wsj.com/3OsqXvw on.wsj.com/3OsqXvw

item.title: 您认为需要专业人士来清洗您的高级珠宝吗？想多了。这里有一份在家专业清洁从钻石耳钉到结婚戒指的指南。
item.description: Think you need a pro to clean your fine jewelry? Think again. Here's a guide to expertly cleansing everything from diamond studs to wedding bands at home. on.wsj.com/42eHQiL on.wsj.com/42eHQiL

item.title: 最近几周，Alphabet、亚马逊和 UPS 等公司宣布裁员。以下是今年迄今为止宣布裁员的其他公司。
item.description: Alphabet, Amazon and UPS are among the companies that have announced job cuts in recent weeks. Here’s a look at others that have announced layoffs so far this year. on.wsj.com/3up05pi on.wsj.com/3up05pi

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：数百万美国人喜欢托比.凯斯的音乐和他的观点。他是一位不折不扣的爱国者，也是美国军队的朋友--2001 年 9 月 11 日恐怖袭击后，这位艺术家影响并捕捉到了美国人的情绪。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Millions of Americans loved Toby Keith’s music as well as his point of view. He was an unabashed patriot and a friend to U.S. troops—an artist who influenced and captured the American mood after the terrorist attacks on Sept. 11, 2001. on.wsj.com/49n3JPh

item.title: 快时尚公司Shein和TikTok的购物部门正在亚马逊的地盘上扩张，试图挖走亚马逊的员工，并在西雅图地区的同一栋办公楼里建造工作区。
item.description: Fast-fashion company Shein and TikTok’s shopping unit are expanding in Amazon's territory, seeking to poach Amazon’s employees and building out workspaces in the same Seattle-area office tower on.wsj.com/42AlyZ8 on.wsj.com/42AlyZ8

item.title: 学习滑雪很难。这些混合型滑雪-滑板鞋让学习变得容易多了。
item.description: Learning to ski is hard. These hybrid ski-skates make it a lot easier. on.wsj.com/3STGyXC on.wsj.com/3STGyXC

item.title: Disney+ 将从 3 月 15 日起播放泰勒-斯威夫特 Eras Tour 演唱会电影的独家剪辑，其中有五首歌曲的片段未包含在影院版本或点播版本中。
item.description: Disney+ will stream an exclusive cut of Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour concert movie starting March 15, with footage of five songs not included in the theatrical release or the on-demand version on.wsj.com/4bu3RhK on.wsj.com/4bu3RhK

item.title: NFL和NBA被迪士尼、福克斯和华纳兄弟推出的体育流媒体服务吓了一跳。
item.description: The NFL and NBA were blindsided by the sports streaming service being launched by Disney, Fox and Warner Bros. Discovery on.wsj.com/4buerFl on.wsj.com/4buerFl

item.title: 预计将有创纪录数量的美国人在超级碗上下注，美国财政部表示，在线体育赌博带来的洗钱风险越来越大
item.description: As a record number of Americans are expected to place bets on the Super Bowl, the U.S. Treasury Department says online sports gambling poses an increasing risk of money laundering on.wsj.com/486S6Lq on.wsj.com/486S6Lq

item.title: 它始于两位博士的一个 "匪夷所思 "的想法。现在，一家英国公司已经占领了这个利润丰厚的市场，不是把人，而是把大多数其他东西送入近太空。鸡块，思乐冰，莎士比亚。
item.description: It began with a "crackpot" idea by two Ph.Ds. Now a U.K. company has cornered the lucrative market of sending not people, but most anything else, into Near Space. A chicken nugget, a Slurpee, Shakespeare. on.wsj.com/3Uyl7wq on.wsj.com/3Uyl7wq
